Text:
Cry more.  It's a 480p file at a low file size.  It is also a higher res than most .avi files.  What's more, the resolution is perfectly fine on a 50 inch TV.  Does a show like Top Gear need to be in full HD?  Probably not, unless you're in love with Clarkson.  Damn 720p snobs.  
Great torrent, thanks heaps Sceneline!
